website_summaries.verdict: Fashion has been heavily influenced by skate wear, and this can be seen in the Vans Primary Check Old Skool. With a pocket-friendly value, it is stylish and simple but has the classic silhouette that many loyal Vans’ fans love. It comfy enough to be worn daily in various activities.But the sneaker also has its downside. Complaints about the color bleeding into the white fabric when wet and too long laces are raised. Nonetheless, people still go back to buying this classic sneaker merely because they adore it.
pros: A handful said they would wear these low tops with almost any outfit they had in mind
One tester said that the shoes don’t even need breaking in and he could wear it immediately without worrying about getting blisters
Another expressed how he really liked the look of the Vans Primary Check Old Skool
The shoes have been lauded by a good number of buyers to be one of the best shoes on the market
A lot liked the sneakers so much that they bought more than one pair of the Vans Primary Check Old Skool in different colors
Almost all of the reviewers said they would recommend the sneakers to their friends and family
At the price that it is offered, buyers think that the shoes are a steal and priced just right
The shoes are a sleek and stylish pair of go-to sneakers, many reviewers said
Buyers can attest that the Vans Primary Check Old Skool has a good fit to it
cons: Some wearers complained that the colors of the shoes bled into the white checkered pattern when wet and destroyed it
One reviewer pointed out that the white fabric gets dirty quickly
Another reviewer didn’t like the laces being too long

customer_reviews.title: Dirty shoes in a broken box...
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn at the seam and held together with a rubber band. There was hair and dirt on the shoes. Seemed like they had been purchased before, someone wore them around their house, and then returned them. The white on the shoes was also yellowed.
customer_reviews.author: SLane

customer_reviews.title: These are fake vans. DO NOT BUY THEM. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fake vans. DO NOT BUY THEM. The stitching and the soles of the shoes are off. They are counterfeit vans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun-bleache too easily and no longer black after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: At first these shoes were pretty good and only applied a little more than usual pressure on the Achilles part of my heels and created rub spots. They got broke in and that is no longer an issue. However, only after wearing these for a month, they have become so sun-bleached they look horrible. Not worth the money paid for a pair of shoes to be ruined from something other than wear or outgrowing them.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all ...ordered red and white and recieved all maroon ...
customer_reviews.author: Ludger Toups

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know Vans was into S&M
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure they used these for enhanced interrogation techniques under the Bush administration.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes, off White, not true White.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great about them for my 13 year old son oh, he loves them. They seem to fit pretty well they have no arch support but if you're buying these you already know that. I won't mention that I thought that these shoes were white and black they are off-white however which isn't bad it's just that I was expecting a bright white set against a black checker. I would buy these again they were good price on Amazon and they have lasted for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Fire guy

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, but NOT authentic Vans.
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes are cute and fit well, they are NOT authentic vans. After reading the reviewers and noticing a abundance of “fake vans” post, I researched and these are what is wrong with these vans 1) the box is a fake, the label and how it closes are not legitimate Vans product 2) the shoes were wrapped in thin plastic and not the authentic Vans print paper. 3) The shoes are missing proper labels (code on the bottom of the shoe does not match the box and label 4) laces are soft and cheap 5) they came with a sticker tag on one shoe when both shoes should have a paper tag.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous but Snug
customer_reviews.text: I love Van's, and this pink and black leopard print is fabulous. That said, not all styles fit my foot in the toe box area. The Old Skools turned out to be a little too narrow, and I had to return. If you need a smidge more room, try the Wards.
customer_reviews.author: Uggie

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these and had an Amazon gift card so we were thrilled to find these. We saw the reviews saying people got fake Vans etc but his are exactly like his other pairs. Packaging is identical and prouduct is same as always. He's been wearing them almost daily since he got them and they are just fine. Anyone who wears these knows you're not getting them for athletic reasons so don't expect great arch support etc. These aren't meant for that .
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Not even the box is legit Vans!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a two star because they are not Vans, they are a knockoff. They fit and feel like a skate shoe, the quality is okay, and they are falsely advertised as a product that they are clearly not. When I got the box I noticed that the box is a fake, the label and how it closes are not legitimate Vans product, when I opened the box I noticed the shoes were wrapped in thin plastic and not the authentic Vans print paper. The shoes are missing proper labels and the laces are soft and cheap, they came with a sticker tag on one shoe when both shoes should have a paper tag.
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine, but very discolored and unsure if they're true Vans band. :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought "True White" and they came discolored and yellowing. SUPER sad, wouldn't recommend. If I hadn't used the "Honey" browser extension (Not an ad) I would have been way more pissed about paying the original $88 price tag. I ended up paying $55, so I'm still upset. It's a lot for shoes that didn't come in perfect condition. They've probably been sitting in a hot warehouse. Questioning if they're true Vans brand.
customer_reviews.author: ErinValerie

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so much more comfortable than the past pairs of vans I have had, because of the heel padding that prevents my heels from slipping and causing blisters. They go great with any outfit and I love the classic stripe that adds some style. For size, I ordered according to the official vans size chart and measured the length in cm, and it was very true to size. These are a casual and comfortable shoe that I would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GirlDagger

customer_reviews.title: Make me feel cool again...
customer_reviews.text: These run small, so for me, I wear a size 12 in every other shoe, but I had to go to 13 in these. I don't remember if Van's were like that back in the day... They look and feel great (rad???). Make me want to get a 20" Redline or Diamond Back and shred. Now my bones are probably brittle and my rheumatism acting up and all I can do is walk around Walmart looking cool (fool???). Don't care. I love them...
customer_reviews.author: RichandFamous

customer_reviews.title: I got one shoe...
customer_reviews.text: But really... only one shoe was in the box... can I give lower than 1 star?
customer_reviews.author: Genna Mazzei

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I got the white and love how they look. They are definitely the correct size and seemed to be somewhat comfortable when I initially tried them on. I wore them for about and hour and half WITH SOCKS and got the biggest blisters on my pinky toes. I have narrow feet so it's not about that. The seem of the shoe can be felt on the inside and rubs the pinky toes. I have to return. I wish I could find a shoe that looks similar but doesn't give blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Dustevie

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes at first. The style is exactly what I wanted and as pictured however they offer little to no support and got dirty really easy. The cloth material isn't easy to clean either. I ended up having these shoes for maybe 4 months until they were trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Msal3

customer_reviews.title: Glue is disintegrating and shoes are falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Vans shoes for years for myself and my children? Have worn them for over 50 years and this is the first time that they have literally fallen apart a bit everywhere. I usually get them from the vans store and this is the first time I’ve purchased them online from this place. Beware! The glue is disintegrating from everywhere
customer_reviews.author: bchstreet

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and even surprised
customer_reviews.text: My boy goes through shoes, boy does he go through shoes, and we have similar tastes in styles of shoes, I think I have him figured out, I don't think the description did these shoes justice though. He loved them, they have a tye die pattern on both sides of the shoe and each side is different, we weren't expecting that. So this mom won the birthday shoe present award. Not bad for world's okayest mom!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: I order 12 US and got a 13
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 12 and got a size 13. Although the shoes are comfortable, unfortunately I can't send them back, as a friend brought it to me to Mexico from a trip he took to the US. I'm going to have to give these away I guess, as they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my teenage son upon his request. He loves them! They ran a little large but that’s ok because he’s still growing. Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: CZeh17

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for me :/
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are stylish and trendy! Unfortunately they didnt have a lot of support and were not a true white in color.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice They are a bit more expensive than the Vans you can get in the store. I would recommend you check the Vans' store.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This wear really heavy and almost taxing to wear. These women 8.5 seemed loose but a 8 would have been too small. For comparison in sizing: I wear a 8.5 (women’s) in Coach shoes, 7.5 (men’s) in Yeezy Boost 350, 5.5 (men’s) in converse all stars. 7 (men’s) in Jordens.
customer_reviews.author: JennyDang Tha God

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem fake
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews after I already placed my order from ppl saying they think they got fake vans. They seem like real vans to me and I’ve been wearing them for 10 years. Love them, happy so far with my buy. Not sure what the other ppl are talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Camie

customer_reviews.title: Love these, hold up in constant daily wear
customer_reviews.text: These are the love of my life. I’ve worn them daily for the past 6 months and they are still holding up nicely. Will probably have to repurchase after a year of constant wear but that is an impressive amount of time for these shoes to last. I bought white rubber laces and use those so they are super easy to get on and off. I bike in these, have worked out, trudged through mud and snow and they have stayed fairly comfy and cute together through it all. Highly recommend for a good everyday casual shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kooi

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance of getting a good pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were yellow and black checkered, and not like in a good way. The soles & the stripe on the side were perfect white. It looked like they were 30+ yrs old & sat in someone's closet the whole time. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: THESE CUT THE SIZE OF YOUR FOOT, FLATTERING FOR LARGER SIZES
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old daughter had to have these. They're super comfortable and since she's in a 8 Men's 9.5 Womens the black front cuts the size and makes your foot look smaller. They ran true to size for her and she Loves them but hers came with some dried glue near the laces which I wasn't crazy about.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: Accurate size, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Accurate size and fast delivery. I read some negative reviews but ordered anyway. The shoe is exactly as described with the authentic Vans label on the heel of shoe. No issues with this order. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The sizing is way off. I have another pair of vans that are the same size but these are probably half a size smaller?! Just buy from the official vans site
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mejia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a gal who was looking everywhere for this shoe in 7.5 woman’s. Thank goodness I found this seller... 5.5 men is 7.5 woman’s - jackpot! (Btw they’re definitely navy/dark blue like in the picture. Idk why the name of this color is teal) Fast shipping, perfect condition, perfect snug fit. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: First time I used them, they cut the back of my feet like a razor, I bled like a pig. Once they expanded a bit they were OK ... a few friends told me that’s always the case with these shoes .. oh well, that’s an extra price to pay I guess.
customer_reviews.author: JC_Serrano

customer_reviews.title: These are way more comfortable than I would have imagined
customer_reviews.text: These are way more comfortable than I would have imagined. I have worn these all day many times over and my feet were as happy at night as they were in the morning - not like typical skate shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe BUT........
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe but the back part has rubbed blisters on my achilles tendon on both feet in a matter of 4 hours wearing them. I literally had to put band-aids on because I started to bleed. none of my other Old Skool Vans have done this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: We got these instead of the velcro ones; they ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these instead of the velcro ones; they might seem a little smaller since we got a half size bigger and they seem ever tighter than the last pair. Then again with a 6 year old's foot, it's hard to know if it's the shoe or the foot. But this is his 3rd pair of these Old Skool Vans and he LOVES them and wears them every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Another Van's satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Van's since the 90's because of the unique styles, good fit, comfortable wear and durability. These did not disappoint. I love the quality of the shoes, (sturdy canvas and thick soles, etc. ) and the blur is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Stir-Crazy SAHM

customer_reviews.title: Too Small and wants me to pay for shipping on return
customer_reviews.text: It said Free Returns when I purchased it and now they want me to pay for the return.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fratilla

customer_reviews.title: It’s a scam.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my package and first of all it was the wrong size and they also look like they had been worn before i can see where they tried to clean the soles...BEWARE!!! If it was up to me i wouldn’t give them any stars at all just pitiful. 😤🤬😡
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my granddaughter but they were to small. Contacted sellers and they immediately started a return. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I just received and opened the box. My first expression is “Awesome” with a big smile. I am a daddy and got this vans shoes for my little girl for Christmas. I know she’s going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: His grandmother purchased these for my 2 year old and all my 2 year olf could say is Ohhhhh😂😂. He loves the wings on them abd the colors are so vibrant!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great summer pickup!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. They werent my first choice, not even my second choice HA! BUT im glad i picked these up. I thought these were all leather but theyre canvas material. They came clean straight out of the box, no issues, smudges, or creases. The gum sole is clean no discoloration or anything. Since I purchased these in white and unfortunately theyre not leather, I sprayed them 3x within 2 days with canvas water repellent before I wore them. They fit exactly how a 10.5US should. They werent too big or too tight. Great summer pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Not real vans, comfortable but after a few days the eyelets we’re coming apart and the paint was flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can walk for miles in these, so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes. Worth every penny. Soles are rubber and don't squeak. Be sure to spray a protective coating to preserve the shoes and to keep them looking new. Love these and feel great walking in for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Meh, color seems misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved vans, but the color looked almost coral/salmon in the pictures. I was disappointed when I got them and they were princess pink. No big deal. I just painted them to my liking. :)
customer_reviews.author: Aze

customer_reviews.title: Fave shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. I ordered them in my size (10) and up half a size because I heard they ran small. They don't, the 10 was roomy enough to add an additional arch support and insole. They are so cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: womenbeshopping

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Dang tho???? What if it doesn't fit when the kids go back to school. My advise....Buy a size larger! Definitely old school and cute as pie.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cant mess with perfection
customer_reviews.text: Just like your Levi's from high school, Vans still fit like they did back in the day.. perfect. The size hasnt changed in over 15 years, and still as comfy as they were yeats ago. Always a solod choice that never need trying on
customer_reviews.author: N8

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was very upset when I received two different size shoes!! One 8 one 9!! Nothing wrong with the shoes themselves, and my money was refunded to my card almost immediately. Ordered another pair and they were correct this time.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to what you sell to your customers
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a size 6.5 but received a 11.5 way off someone clearly wasn’t paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: ZaneD Noel

customer_reviews.title: No good for wide-ish feet
customer_reviews.text: Unisex sizing sucks. My feet are a little wide so I usually just order a mens size and that takes care of it, but no way to do it here. Tried anyway and they were too tight. I ended up going with the high top skate shoes, and those had enough room.
customer_reviews.author: hanah

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy shoes and incredibly stylish
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. I have a pair myself and I suggest sizing up to the next half size! Super comfy shoes and incredibly stylish. I got the leather ones for him since they were $25 cheaper than the canvas, and they are MUCH nicer... I can tell they are going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: They're vans. They're great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, and the color of these is exactly what I wanted. Not the most comfortable shoes in the world, but beauty is pain. Right?
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get these! Arrived in time. Quality is excellent and these are genuine Vans. Some reviews made me a little leary at first but I took a chance and glad I did❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Classic, casual shoe. You can wear it with anything, just don't expect too much comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Good casual, everyday shoe. Leather is okay quality, nothing great but good for the price. It is actually canvas on the inside and leather on the outside, and it's pretty comfortable. It does run long for me, I went half a size down from my true size and I still have some space in the toebox. If you're looking for cushion, don't go for a pair of Vans. They are skate shoes and have no cushion in the midsole. These are walking around shoes only. Vans are obviously a classic and a good pair to have in your rotation. Have gotten many compliments on the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ashwinr136

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Inexpensive Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Vans are the shoe I always end up coming back to. They are durable, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are simple yet are stylish and can go with just about any color or outfit you choose to wear. They are very comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t owned a pair of Vans for a long time! Needed a quality sturdy skate shoe again. As usual, super comfortable. This style is so classic and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Sweat 😓
customer_reviews.text: These are the least breathable shoes I’ve ever owned. I tend to have sweaty feet no matter what shoes I wear but woah these were like foot saunas.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are in style and are unisex
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shoes. Although it did not fit him because I got a size smaller. I ended up giving them to a nephew and bought the shoes again on a bigger size for my son. I got one as well for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Felix A. Cadena

customer_reviews.title: I have wanted these for so long.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40 year old dude. I have had vans in the past but I always liked the classic look of this model. I finally 'pulled the trigger' and bought a pair. I get compliments from old and young people alike. Nothing bad to say about these shoes. They do run a tiny bit larger than a normal size 10.5 in other shoes. A half size down may have been too small though.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Soon loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. It’s his first pair of Vans and he’s in love with them. He’s usually in Jordan’s or converse.
customer_reviews.author: Zazzy Lina

customer_reviews.title: Cool look but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cool look, but poor fit and very uncomfortable to wear for the day. At $25 they would be marginal, but at $65 they are just not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little smaller than other brands in the same size, but not too small. And judging by previous vans purchases the will stretch a bit after wearing a few times.
customer_reviews.author: B Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift for my son. Our whole family loves the brand and quality of the shoes. We all own a pair of Vans
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Retro-ish kicks
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sneakers these days I think. I like the monotone retro-ish look. I don't skate, but these still get beat up fairly quickly biking (I apparently abuse shoes as well). The biggest downside of these shoes is that the more disgustingly beat up they look on the outside, the more comfortable they become -- so if you see folks wearing these shoes and they look like they are about to fall off their feet, you'll now know why. ;-) Also, they aren't Converse, which are sadly (and have been for several years now) owned by Nike.
customer_reviews.author: r t n

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. These shoes did not last three months. Take the discount you get from Kohl's and get the authentic ones there.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are perfect. No skateboard included.
customer_reviews.text: They’re vans. Arrived new in original box. Reminds me of the good ole days in the 80’s. Cute. Correct color. Quick delivery. I just need a skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite vans so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite vans and it’s not a knockoff, I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar F.

customer_reviews.title: Vans Sk8
customer_reviews.text: Vans shoe has held up. Not much support and does not have a lot of room to add any type of support soles.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: Overall, A Very Good Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers were priced higher than it should be but they were the only company who had my size. There were problems getting the product to me also because the company mistakenly put my residence as a business instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to throw in the wash and clean
customer_reviews.text: These Vans are comfortable as well as stylish. When they get dirty, I just throw them in the washer and the clean up good as new!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting these shoes for a while now. Love them. Comfortable and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Sent wrong color and wrong size. Shoe looks to be very good quality. Just won’t fit my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I just want my shoes man I've order these THREE TIMES and every single time I order them I get a horribly wrong size! I ordered 8 in woman's every time and I get 12 in mens every time !
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love checked
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, broke in for one day. That’s all they needed and were comfy and easy to wear! I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Old school comeback
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. An instant hit. Fit great, sturdy. Well made. Girls were jealous too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great uniform shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 8th grader is required to wear all black or all white shoes and this all black van is just perfect. Works with her uniform pants and dresses. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Crammed in box, bent up
customer_reviews.text: Black specks on the white parts, shoes crammed into box so now they're bent and stuck that way. Also black dirt/powder looking substance on parts of the white. And this is also the first time in my entire life I've purchased a pair of Vans and it didn't come with a sticker. That's not really a big deal but considering the crappy shape these shoes are in that's just the cherry on top. Don't waste your money unless you want a bent up, distorted, pre-dirtied paid of shoes. The box was also damaged.
customer_reviews.author: T Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: They run small my son wear a 12 in little boys it was tight and fit like a 10-11 sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Larrieu

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He is wearing them constantly while skateboarding. So far they are holding up well and he says they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted I mean they are Vans you know good quality great fit and stylish !
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she says it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I’d hoped. Not much support. I wear them for short periods, but not when I’m planning on doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister had sent them to her house and she received on time for her birthday and absolutely loves the look and the fit is perfect true to size and color
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 13-year-old daughter. She loves them and they fit as advertised. Have held up well given that they are her current main choice in foot wear.
customer_reviews.author: GPOhio

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers. Fit well & look good.
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers came in a timely manner. They look good & feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Tsipora N.

customer_reviews.title: love the style and quality
customer_reviews.text: Other than absolutely no support (insoles works great)...love the style and quality. Planning to buy the black suede.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but the color is very off in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but the color is very off in the pictures. The tan leather is very orange in person and was annoying to look at. Returned these and found an identical pair of shoes but in black.
customer_reviews.author: Pnuu

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never bought a different style of shoes in over 5 years! They’re too awesome
customer_reviews.text: Never disappointed in these shoes! Been wearing different colors of the same shoes for 5 years now. Once I bought my first pair I never went back😎
customer_reviews.author: C-17Loadmaster

customer_reviews.title: I love vans from way back
customer_reviews.text: I love vans from way back. The only issue is the back seam of the shoe is very stiff and rubbed a blister the first week of wearing them. This is the only pair of vans that have ever done that to me
customer_reviews.author: Kara chico

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would recommend! I love these shoes. They’re very comfortable, even if you have wide feet like me. True to size. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: The product appeared to be just right, but a little weak in the stitching next to the rubber sole. My 12 year old loves to wear them, even though there are some of the glue is failing. They are a good weight, but where the rubber meets the road, questionable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vans
customer_reviews.text: Love these old school classic vans. They came just as expected. Perfect fit. I have wide feet and it took some time to break them in but once I did they have been amazing. I want to get a few in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyna ziske

customer_reviews.title: We Love Vans
customer_reviews.text: Typically satisfied when wearing Vans.....Nice shoes-Fits as usual and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck purchase
customer_reviews.text: After buying these sneakers a strange lady act like she was going to run me over with her car on island Ave. I had to run out the street.
customer_reviews.author: Jamillah harris

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful present
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my grand daughter. She loves them. Thank you Vans and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes only thing I should have read the reviews first because you definitely need to buy a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmademedoit

customer_reviews.title: Go bigger on size
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. My daughter wears a 10 and it was pretty tight on her feet. Especially in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says that they are very comfortable. She had to have all black sneakers for school and Vans are her favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Q & Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaks
customer_reviews.text: These are all my grandson wants to wear. They fit well and seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Adults’ Old Skool Classic Suede/Canvas Sneakers
product_meta.description: The Vans Old Skool, with the iconic side stripe, is a low top lace-up with re-enforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, signature rubber waffle outsoles, and padded collars for support and flexibility.
feature_bullets: The Checkerboard Old Skool combines the Vans classic sidestripe skate shoe with sturdy canvas and suede uppers, the iconic Vans Checkerboard print, padded collars for support and flexibility, and platform signature rubber waffle outsoles. This classic shoe is instantly recognisable and a perfect match to any casual wardrobe.
